sys_script_include.name: NeedItUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c6cb7989079620102456f2ae7c1ed0af
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.</description><name>NeedItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtils = Class.create();
NeedItUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
	},
	
	isDatePast: function(strDate) {
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		
		// If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
		var bTestDate = this.testdate.before(this.rightnow) ? true : false;
		return bTestDate;
	},
	
	/*isDateToday: function(strDate) {
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		
		// Get the date portion of rightnow and testdate (no timestamp)
		var today = this.rightnow.getLocalDate();
		var istoday = this.testdate.getLocalDate();
		
		// Compare today and istoday to see if they are the same day
		var bTestDate = today.compareTo(istoday) ? true : false;
		return bTestDate;
	},*/
	
    type: 'NeedItUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-11 11:26:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>c6cb7989079620102456f2ae7c1ed0af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c6cb7989079620102456f2ae7c1ed0af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-12 01:22:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
